name: Lendable
slogan: Building a 21st century financial institution from scratch
description:
Finance is one of the last great stale service industries, and customers are suffering for it. Lendable is building a modern financial institution from scratch using technology, data science and attitude! 

With our first product we have built the world's fastest consumer lending platform, powered by real-time, automated credit decisions and continuous risk pricing. How fast? Our relentless drive to automate and improve processes allows customers to apply for and receive their loan in well under 10 minutes on average (instead of days or weeks). Our second product will launch this year and we’re planning on much more!

We are well-funded, profitable, and one of the fastest growing businesses in the UK as recognised by Tech Track 100 and the Fast 50. We are a focused team of 70 individuals with founders previously at Goldman Sachs, Rocket Internet and BCG, with 2 featured in Forbes’ 30 under 30 list.

What are you waiting for?! Come and find out more.

team.title: Head of Talent
team.name: Amandeep Shergill
team.bioHtml: Scaled talent at international startups. Currently Lendable, previously Cleo, Consensys, Apttus, Cloudreach, Intuit

jobs.title: PHP Symfony Engineer
jobs.description:
Finance is one of the last great stale service industries, and customers are suffering for it. Lendable is building a modern financial institution from scratch using technology, data science and attitude! 

Our first product is offering personal loans. We have built the world's fastest consumer lending platform, powered by real-time, automated credit decisions and continuous risk pricing. How fast? Our relentless drive to automate and improve processes allows customers to apply for and receive their loan in well under 10 minutes on average (instead of days or weeks). Our second product will launch this year and we’re planning on much more!

We are well-funded, profitable, and one of the fastest growing businesses in the UK as recognised by Tech Track 100 and the Fast 50. We are a focused team of 60 individuals with founders previously at Goldman Sachs, Rocket Internet and BCG, with 2 featured in Forbes’ 30 under 30 list. We are backed by several leading investors who have also been involved in Monzo and GoCardless.

We have a unique, enthusiastic culture: we give talented and curious individuals the opportunity to stretch themselves and work in an environment that encourages personal development.

﻿The role:

We’re looking for a PHP engineer to join our engineering team. This is the team that put the Tech in FinTech, our current team of 10 backend engineers, 2 frontend developers and 1 devops engineer have helped transform finance by building a next generation lending platform and they’re at it again with a brand new product launching this year. 

There’s a lot to do, from building and integrating new API’s to further improve the customer journey and optimising the lending platform through to deep architectural discussions and new product development. 

What you’ll be working on:

Building API’s for new partnerships 
Helping launch a new product platform for launch in 2020

Our Tech Stack
Backend:

PHP 7.3
Symfony 4.2
Node.js
AWS
MySQL
RabbitMQ
Docker
Kubernetes

Frontend:
React & React Native, TypeScript, MobX, Redux, Stylus and SASS

Other:
Jenkins and CircleCI - we deploy to production as soon as we finish a feature 
Behat, PHPUnit, Jest, Selenium and Detox for automated testing

What we’re looking for:
Strong PHP development experience, ideally with PHP 7
A good understanding of a modern PHP framework like Symfony, Zend or Laravel
Strong understanding of abstraction and scalability 
A keen desire to want to learn and input into a highly collaborative team 
If you’ve worked in a Kanban environment, it would be a plus but not needed

What’s Next:

We’re not a corporate so we try our best to get things moving as quickly as possible. For this role we’d expect:

A quick phone call with one of the team
A short exercise to complete in your own time  
Onsite Interview 
Discuss the exercise you completed
Meet the team  


What you’ll get:

The opportunity to build a new and improved financial institution from scratch!
A best in class compensation package including stock options 
Cycle to Work scheme
Lunch cooked by onsite chefs 3 times a week
An open and honest culture with flat hierarchy
Personal development and learning time
A fun and inspiring work environment; featuring monthly socials, weekly team lunches, onsite Yoga every week, an annual one-week work event abroad for everyone (our last one was in Tuscany!) and more
A multi-cultural team made up of dozens of different nationalities and backgrounds
A unique office - one of the largest lofts in Shoreditch - with a fully stocked fridge and kitchen
We're an equal opportunity employer and are looking to make Lendable one of the most inclusive and open workspaces in London

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description:
Finance is one of the last great stale service industries, and customers are suffering for it. Lendable is building a modern financial institution from scratch using technology, data science and attitude! 

Our first product is offering personal loans. We have built the world's fastest consumer lending platform, powered by real-time, automated credit decisions and continuous risk pricing. How fast? Our relentless drive to automate and improve processes allows customers to apply for and receive their loan in well under 10 minutes on average (instead of days or weeks). Our second product will launch this year and we’re planning on much more!

We are well-funded, profitable, and one of the fastest growing businesses in the UK as recognised by Tech Track 100 and the Fast 50. We are a focused team of 60 individuals with founders previously at Goldman Sachs, Rocket Internet and BCG, with 2 featured in Forbes’ 30 under 30 list. We are backed by several leading investors who have also been involved in Monzo and GoCardless.

We have a unique, enthusiastic culture: we give talented and curious individuals the opportunity to stretch themselves and work in an environment that encourages personal development.

The role:
We’re looking for a DevOps Engineer to help shape our development environments using terraform and ansible but just as comfortable managing deployment pipelines in a kubernetes environment whilst helping developers grow. An amazing role for someone that wants to truly impact a complex and growing developer environment! 

Our Tech Stack
PHP 7.2, Symfony v3.4 (moving to v4), Node.js, Python
AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Helm
MySQL / Aurora
RabbitMQ
ELK / EFK
React & React Native, TypeScript, MobX, Redux, Stylus and SASS
Jenkins and CircleCI 
Behat, PHPUnit, Jest, Selenium and Detox 

What you’ll get involved with:
Proactively audit the security of our systems 
Plan for the maintainability of the infrastructure and foresee weaknesses in the setup 
Design and build the infrastructure to support our existing and upcoming financial products
Administer and support our 24/7 AWS based Docker infrastructure, ensuring it is secure, resilient and performant
Work with our engineers to build and maintain effective CI pipelines and deployment processes
Identify new technologies where appropriate to improve the automation 
Document infrastructure setup making it replicable

What we’re looking for:
Real world experience with Docker and Kubernetes
Exposure to multiple cloud platforms - AWS, Google Cloud, Azure
Belief that anything and everything can be automated with code
Experience administering a 24/7, high profile infrastructure 
Comfortable writing automation code in multiple scripting languages
Strong experience with setting up logging and monitoring
Comfortable reading developer code when need to dig deep
Recent hands on experience creating containerized deployments 
Demonstrable experience with networks, security, load balancers, DNS, etc 
High level of attention to detail 
Excellent verbal and written communication
Additional information

What’s Next:
We’re not a corporate so we try our best to get things moving as quickly as possible. For this role we’d expect:
A quick phone call with one of the team
A short exercise to complete in your own time  
Onsite Interview 
Discuss the exercise you completed
Meet the team  

What you’ll get:
The opportunity to build a new and improved financial institution from scratch!
A best in class compensation package including stock options 
An open and honest culture with flat hierarchy
Personal development and learning time
A fun and inspiring work environment; featuring monthly socials, weekly team lunches, onsite Yoga every week, an annual one-week work event abroad for everyone (our last one was in Tuscany!) and more
A multi-cultural team made up of dozens of different nationalities and backgrounds
A unique office - one of the largest lofts in Shoreditch - with a fully stocked fridge and kitchen
We're an equal opportunity employer and are looking to make Lendable one of the most inclusive and open workspaces in London
